posts.post_content:
Clean PSA 2. $40.00+ $3.00 shipping. Check or money order only. No PayPal. New York residents must pay sales tax. Please email me at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. No PMs, please. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.

Please visit my newly updated website here: [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/index.html[/url] with lots of new cards and many lowered prices. Thanks, and happy collecting

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t201herz1.jpg[/IMG]

Ed,

I will take the Graham Cubs for $90

Matt
